DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the study is to determine if patients undergoing radiofrequency neurotomy of lumbar facet joints that are adjacent to previously placed pedical screws from a fusion, will lead to an increase in the temperature of the pedical screws.
DOC.criteria: Scheduled for Radiofrequency procedure AND has spinal hardware placed from a previous spinal surgery 1) Active infection over skin where needle will be placed 2) Coagulopathy 3) Preganancy
